attributes.additional_details: I am very disappointed with the conservative party even though I have been a member for 40 years I have just resigned because I feel like many other members that this goverment is not listening to the voters regarding the Human Rights issues because on the doorstep this is one of the worries people have got and we need to abolish article 8  and we should stop keep giving in to Brussels because if Germany and France are not afraid why are we? The same thing should apply to immigration.
